overview:
Tom Tentoglou is a formally trained industrial designer. Beginning as a studio artist for J. Walter Thompson, Tom later transitioned to become the Chief Ergonomic and Automotive Styling Designer for TVR North America. Over the last 13 years Tom has applied his skills as Creative Director and Account Supervisor in the interactive industry winning several Gold and Silver Marketing Awards from Marketing Magazine, and most recently an FITC award for Best Canadian Studio Website.

Currently Tom is President of M79 Studios, a Toronto based digital agency. He has been entrusted with many of Canada’s most notable brands including Rogers, Bell Canada, Maple Leaf Foods, Nikon Canada, Petro-Canada, Bayer, P&G Canada, and Royal Bank to name a few.
